to.sven.androidrccar.common.model

Class ConnectionParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.model.ConnectionParameter

  • public class ConnectionParameter
extends java.lang.Object
    Data object that contains the information for connecting to the Host. The instances of this class are immutable.
    Author:
    sven

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      Default port used by the host
      java.lang.String host
      IP/Hostname of the Host
      java.lang.String password
      Password, for authentication on the host.
      int port
      Port where the Host application listen.
      private static java.lang.String URL_BASE
      The base URL, that is used to receive intents from other Applications (like the user click on the link in a mail).
      private static java.lang.String URL_FORMAT
      The complete URL with parameters for formating.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionParameter(java.lang.String connectionURL)
      Builds the connection parameters from a connection URL, like it can receive in a intent.
      ConnectionParameter(java.lang.String host, int port, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a new instance of ConnectionParameter
      ConnectionParameter(java.lang.String hostWithPort, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a new instance of ConnectionParameter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String toConnectionURL()
      Returns the connection parameters as a URL that can received by client activity intent filter to connect to the host.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the IP/Hostname with port (if it's not the default port).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • ConnectionParameter

        public ConnectionParameter(java.lang.String connectionURL)
        Builds the connection parameters from a connection URL, like it can receive in a intent.
        Parameters:
        connectionURL - connection parameters encoded in a URL

      • ConnectionParameter

        public ConnectionParameter(java.lang.String hostWithPort,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Creates a new instance of ConnectionParameter.
        Parameters:
        hostWithPort - A string that contains the host and optionally the port delimited by ':' from host. If no port is given, the (DEFAULT_PORT) is used.
        password - password

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the IP/Hostname with port (if it's not the default port).

        public java.lang.String toConnectionURL()
        Returns the connection parameters as a URL that can received by client activity intent filter to connect to the host.
